Meet with your legislators and encourage them to support civil rights and civil liberties.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Have you RSVP’ed yet for ACLU at the Capitol? Join us on Wednesday, March 13 for a day of advocacy and action. We have an ambitious legislative agenda this year, and we need your help to make it happen.

Meet with your lawmakers and encourage them to improve our criminal justice system, pass comprehensive sex ed, and ensure Colorado is a welcoming place for immigrants.

We’ll provide breakfast in the morning and a full training on how to talk to legislators about our priority bills. Then, we’ll team up and head over to the Capitol for lobbying meetings. Afterwards, we’ll meet back for lunch and a recap of the day.

2019 Lobby Day

Talk to your elected representatives about the need to protect and advance civil liberties in Colorado. Join us for Lobby Day!

Wednesday, March 13, 8 a.m.
First Baptist Church
1373 Grant St.
Denver, CO 80203

REGISTER

Talking directly with legislators is one of the most important ways for us to win on our issues and to build up long-term champions for civil rights and civil liberties in the Colorado legislature.

Travel stipends may be available, email Delana at dmaynes@aclu-co.org

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Colorado
